summary: Generate single-page CLI documentation in Markdown or JSON. Useful for agents that need an authoritative command reference.

usage.description: Emit comprehensive Markdown documentation (mirrors the content in `docs/cli.md`).
Structured JSON containing every command, argument, alias, and description — perfect for tool schemas.

agent_tips: Cache the JSON output during tool initialization so the LLM has access to command schemas without re-invoking `blz`.
Pair with `blz --prompt <command>` to retrieve actionable workflows while the JSON docs supply the raw argument metadata.
fields_in_json_mode: args – array of arguments with type, default, requirements
subcommands – nested structure reflecting the Clap hierarchy
